तिम्रो आँखामा के छ ? -- Dreams,
\
Overrated ones\
With open eyelids\
Leading salty water\
Down the skinny hills.\
I have tested them --\
I have tasted them --\
those dreams,\
The flavor is bitter these days.\
हा हाई...\
सुत्नै नदिने
\
यी सपनाहरू !

_Republished in April 2021_
